attributes.action: Hold a referendum on removing the London Assembly and London Mayor
attributes.additional_details:
Hold a referendum for all voters who live inside the M25.
It only has to be very basic question:
"Do you think the London Mayor and London Assembly should be removed."
"Yes or no."
attributes.background: We believe too much power is in the hands of the London Assembly and London Mayor. We are particularly concerned about the impact of expanding the ULEZ on people who are struggling with a cost of living crisis to put food on the tables, keep kids clothed and fed while struggling to heat homes.
